frame.name: FR_Reimbursement
frame.definition:
<def-root>
This frame involves a <fen>Giver</fen> giving <fen>Money</fen> (or alternatively another kind of <fen>Non_financial_compensation</fen>) to a <fen>Recipient</fen>, who had to spend some (other) money because of a <fen>Cause_of_expense</fen>. The <fen>Giver</fen> is not necessarily responsible for this prior expense. The particular case in which the <fen>Giver</fen> had borrowed the money from the <fen>Recipient</fen> is described in the more specific Repayment frame. <ex></ex> <asf>Relation to fndata-1.5:</asf>: Not existing in fndata-1.5. Corresponds to a more general situation than that of the Repayment frame. </def-root>

FE.name: Giver
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Giver</fen> begins in possession of the <fen>Money</fen> and causes it to be in the possession of the <fen>Recipient</fen></def-root>

FE.name: Non_financial_compensation
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Non_financial_compensation</fen> is what is given to the <fen>Recipient</fen>, other than Money. <ex><fex name="Giver">La firme d'Etat</fex> <t>rembourse</t> alors en <fex name="Non_financial_compensation">pétrole</fex> <fex name="Recipient">l'opérateur</fex>. </ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Recipient
FE.definition: <def-root>The entity that ends up in possession of the <fen>Money</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Cause_of_expense
FE.definition: <def-root>The state of affairs which occasioned a prior expense for the <fen>Recipient</fen>. <ex><fex name="Giver">L'assurance</fex> m'a <t>remboursé</t> <fex name="Cause_of_expense">les dégâts</fex>. </ex> </def-root>
